name: Feesable Fee Calculator
author: Feesable

sections.description: Display the Feesable Fee Calculator on your site. Simply configure your settings and then add the [feesable_calculator] shortcode in the desired location.
sections.installation:
We recommend you install the plugin via the automated installer interface within WordPress. Just search for “Feesable”, then install and activate.
If for some reason you are unable to use this and need to install the plugin manually, you can follow these steps:

  1. Download the feesable-fee-calculator.zip to your computer and unzip it
  2. Upload the feesable-fee-calculator folder into your site’s /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Configure the settings including your school code in Settings -> Feesable (to obtain a school code you need to have an active subscription to the Feesable Fee Calculator – please contact support@feesable.com.au for more info).
  5. Add the [feesable_calculator] shortcode where you want the calculator to display on your website

Contact support@feesable.com.au for installation support.
